html.p: Create more actionable alerts by controlling both the content and format of the email. This feature includes:

ul.li: Ability to customize message body with further information around what the search is, action items for results, and more
Ability to customize subject and body with tokens generated from the search, server, and job info
Opt-in to various search related details to automatically be included in the message body
Choose from several options for result formats (inline, attached, format, linked)
Tokenization of first result fields for inclusion within To, CC, BCC, Subject, and Body
Apply global footer to include a custom signature, confidentiality agreement, and more
